title: Want that Teemo plush so bad
body: So I can set it on fire in my back yard.

replies.body: You already have one... it's sitting in your bed laughing... waiting for you to near him, it... waiting to come from the shadows... beware... beware of the mushrooms in the bathroom... it's hidden in the sink and bathtub... seriously hate that passive, man.

hahaha! Good joke, fire cannot kill Satan
{{summoner:14}}{{summoner:14}}{{champion:17}}{{summoner:14}}{{summoner:14}}
